completeDesc.cn: 您已开启了四号谷地的部分储藏箱。
completeDesc.en: You have opened a number of storage crates in Valley IV.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地开启120个储藏箱
desc.en: Open 120 storage crates in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 您已开启了四号谷地的大部分储藏箱。
completeDesc.en: You have opened most storage crates in Valley IV.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地开启180个储藏箱
desc.en: Open 180 storage crates in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn:
四号谷地的所有储藏箱在您眼中无所遁形！
噢，锁闭构造开启的声音多么悦耳。
completeDesc.en:
No storage crates in Valley IV can escape you! 
The sound of disengaging locks is just so delightful.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地开启288个储藏箱
desc.en: Open 288 storage crates in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 您已初步唤醒了四号谷地的协议网络。
completeDesc.en: You have taken the first steps to awaken the Protocol Network of Valley IV.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地解锁14个协议传送点
desc.en: Unlock 14 TP Points in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 您已完全构建了四号谷地的协议网络。
completeDesc.en: You have completely established the Protocol Network of Valley IV.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地解锁28个协议传送点
desc.en: Unlock 28 TP Points in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 事无巨细，您留意到了散落于四号谷地角落的情报。
completeDesc.en: Every discovery matters. You have noticed pieces of intel scattered throughout Valley IV.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地收集4份调查报告
desc.en: Gather 4 investigation reports in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn:
事无巨细，您细心留意到了散落于四号谷地角落的情报。
一张纸片，一页杂志……大事往往隐于微末。
completeDesc.en:
Every discovery matters. Your observant eyes have noticed pieces of intel scattered throughout Valley IV. 
A newspaper cutting, a page of a magazine... Major events are usually hidden in unassuming places and details.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地收集6份调查报告
desc.en: Gather 6 investigation reports in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 初始之物的遗失片段正于您手中再会。
completeDesc.en: Lost fragments of the primal artifact have reconvened in your hands.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地收集80个醚质
desc.en: Gather 80 Aurylenes in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn:
初始之物的遗失片段正于您手中再会。
它曾是旧日荣光的一角。
completeDesc.en:
Lost fragments of the primal artifact have reconvened in your hands. 
It was once a shard of glory now faded.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地收集120个醚质
desc.en: Gather 120 Aurylenes in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn:
初始之物的遗失片段正于您手中再会。
它代表着我们终将抵达的终点、希望和梦。
completeDesc.en:
Lost fragments of the primal artifact have reconvened in your hands. 
It is the symbol of our final destination as well as our hopes and dreams.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地收集166个醚质
desc.en: Gather 166 Aurylenes in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 我们收到了大量二进制数据，经转译，发送者似乎在向您表达感谢。
completeDesc.en: We have collected and translated vast amounts of binary data. The senders seem to be describing their gratefulness.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地修复25个Delta机器人
desc.en: Repair 25 Delta Robots in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 我们收到了大量二进制数据，经转译，发送者似乎在表示愿为您赴汤蹈火。
completeDesc.en: We have collected and translated vast amounts of binary data. The senders seem to be willing to risk their safety for you.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地修复35个Delta机器人
desc.en: Repair 35 Delta Robots in Valley IV

completeDesc.cn: 我们收到了大量二进制数据，经转译，发送者似乎迫切想要尊您为“Delta救星，众机器人的拯救者，四号谷地机械之王”。
completeDesc.en: We have collected and translated vast amounts of binary data. The senders seem desperate to honor you with this title: "DELTA Savior, Champion of Robotkind, and Machine God of Valley IV."

desc.cn: 于四号谷地修复43个Delta机器人
desc.en: In Valley IV, repair 43 Delta robots

completeDesc.cn: 部分对手怀疑您在隐蔽角落偷偷使用了协议传送技术直达终点。
completeDesc.en: Several competitors suspect you secretly used Tele-Protocol tech to help you get to the finishing line.

desc.cn: 于四号谷地赢下4场赛跑挑战
desc.en: In Valley IV, win Athletic Race 4 times

desc.cn: 于四号谷地赢下4场赛跑挑战
desc.en: In Valley IV, win Athletic Race 4 times

desc.cn: 于四号谷地赢下4场赛跑挑战
desc.en: In Valley IV, win Athletic Race 4 times

desc.cn: 于四号谷地赢下4场赛跑挑战
desc.en: In Valley IV, win Athletic Race 4 times

completeDesc.cn: 您已开启了武陵的部分储藏箱。
completeDesc.en: You have opened a number of storage crates in Wuling.

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城开启227个储藏箱
desc.en: Open 227 storage crates in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城开启227个储藏箱
desc.en: Open 227 storage crates in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

completeDesc.cn: 您已初步唤醒了武陵的协议网络。
completeDesc.en: You have taken the first steps to awaken the Protocol Network of Wuling.

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城解锁19个协议传送点
desc.en: Unlock 19 TP Points in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城解锁19个协议传送点
desc.en: Unlock 19 TP Points in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

completeDesc.cn: 事无巨细，您留意到了散落于武陵角落的情报。
completeDesc.en: Every discovery matters. You have noticed pieces of intel scattered throughout Wuling.

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城收集2份调查报告
desc.en: Gather 2 investigation reports in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

completeDesc.cn: 初始之物的遗失片段正于您手中重聚。
completeDesc.en: Lost fragments of the primal artifact have once again gathered in your hands.

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城收集74个醚质
desc.en: Gather 74 Aurylenes in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

desc.cn: 于景玉谷和武陵城收集74个醚质
desc.en: Gather 74 Aurylenes in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

completeDesc.cn:
您以精妙的身法在压力板间跃动，成功使其恢复了完美的平衡。
“好一手羽兽三抄水！”
completeDesc.en:
You elegantly leaped from one plate to another and restored the perfect balance. 
"A wondrous display of the Fowlbeast Water Prancer stance!"

desc.cn: 激活景玉谷和武陵城的8组压力板
desc.en: Complete 8 pressure plate challenges in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

completeDesc.cn:
真是一个好玩伴。经分析，这似乎是长股兽们向您道谢，邀您再来的鸣声。
“呱呱呱，呱呱呱呱呱”
completeDesc.en:
What an incredible game. We analyzed the lankybeast croaks and they seem interested to seeing you again. 
"Ribbit, ribbit. Rrrrribbit-ribbit-ribbit."

desc.cn: 完成景玉谷和武陵城的6次萤火虫传递
desc.en: Complete 6 glowbug passing challenges in Jingyu Valley and Wuling City

name.en: "Swat the Lanky and Pass the Bug"

completeDesc.cn: 您已能熟练截断敌人攻势。
completeDesc.en: You are an expert in intercepting enemy attacks.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计打断30次敌人的蓄力状态
desc.en: Interrupt the enemies' charging states 30 times during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您已经能够在敌人攻击行动展开的一瞬就将之截断。
completeDesc.en: You now interrupt enemies just when they're about to do something more aggressive.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计打断50次敌人的蓄力状态
desc.en: Interrupt the enemies' charging states 50 times during combat

completeDesc.cn: 即便是再微小的敌意也能被您察觉，即便是再隐蔽的动作也能被您遏止。
completeDesc.en: You can now detect even the most minute hint of aggression, and interrupt any acts of belligerence, no matter how subtle.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计打断100次敌人的蓄力状态
desc.en: Interrupt the enemies' charging states 100 times during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您的干员们已经历磨合，能够展开合作，携手对敌。
completeDesc.en: Your operators are fully trained to unleash combos on the enemy.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施放500次连携技
desc.en: Perform 500 combos during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您的干员们已经历磨合，能够敏锐捕捉战机，协同作战。
completeDesc.en: Your operators are fully trained. They will exploit opportunities and unleash combos during combat.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施放1000次连携技
desc.en: Perform 1000 combos during combat

completeDesc.cn:
您的干员们已经历磨合，协同互助已是他们作战的主要方式。
彼此之间的信任，这正是我们行向尽头的依仗。
completeDesc.en:
Your operators are fully trained, and they fight primarily as a concerted team with combos. 
Mutual trust is what we depend on to reach our destination.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施放2000次连携技
desc.en: Perform 2000 combos during combat

completeDesc.cn: 在协议空间的幻影中，您阻止了象征着毁灭的星体重归大地。
completeDesc.en: In the illusions of the Protocol Space, you stopped the Astarron of destruction from ever returning to the land.

desc.cn: 通关“危境祸影·三位一体”
desc.en: Complete Crisis Calamity: Triaggelos

desc.cn: 在240秒内通关“危境祸影·三位一体”
desc.en: Complete "Crisis Calamity: Triaggelos" in 240s

completeDesc.cn: 在协议空间的幻影中，您再一次击溃了苍白的巨像。
completeDesc.en: In the illusions of the Protocol Space, once again you defeated the great effigy of pale marble.

desc.cn: 通关“危境祸影·白垩界卫”
desc.en: Complete Crisis Calamity: Marble Aggelomoirai

desc.cn: 在240秒内通关“危境祸影·白垩界卫”
desc.en: Complete "Crisis Calamity: Marble Aggelomoirai" in 240s

completeDesc.cn: 在协议空间的幻影中，他暴力、狂热、愤怒的前路亦会被您截断。
completeDesc.en: In the illusions of the Protocol Space, you ended his path of violence, fanaticism, and fury.

desc.cn: 通关“危境狂影·罗丹”
desc.en: Complete Crisis Pandemonium: Rhodagn

desc.cn: 在120秒内通关“危境狂影·罗丹”
desc.en: Complete "Crisis Pandemonium: Rhodagn" in 120s

completeDesc.cn: 干员们的作战风格，您熟记于心。
completeDesc.en: You are familiar with your operators' way of fighting.

desc.cn: 通关任意5个干员教学
desc.en: Complete any 5 Operator Guide stages

completeDesc.cn: 即便是最危险的协议空间，亦无法阻止您寻得培养干员的资源。
completeDesc.en: Even the most dangerous Protocol Spaces cannot stop you from getting operator progression resources.

desc.cn:
通关以下协议空间
“协议空间·干员经验”的“噩梦昭显之地”
“协议空间·钱币收集”的“金币之祝”
“协议空间·干员进阶”的“心照乱海”
“协议空间·技能提升”的“高塔幻景”
“协议空间·武器经验”的“铳匠们的埋骨冢”
“协议空间·武器进阶”的“锤锻检定Lv5”

completeDesc.cn: 即便是最危险的协议空间，亦无法阻止您为干员们找到最顶尖的材料。
completeDesc.en: Even the most dangerous Protocol Spaces cannot stop you from getting the best materials for your operators.

desc.cn: 通关所有“协议空间·高阶培养”
desc.en: Complete all Protocol Space: Advanced Progression

desc.cn: 通关所有“协议空间·高阶培养”
desc.en: Complete all Protocol Space: Advanced Progression

desc.cn: 通关所有“协议空间·高阶培养”
desc.en: Complete all Protocol Space: Advanced Progression

desc.en: Complete all Protocol Space: Advanced Progression

desc.cn: 通关所有“协议空间·高阶培养”
desc.en: Complete all Protocol Space: Advanced Progression

completeDesc.cn: 淤积于大地上的超域能量消散了，但它仍会重聚。
completeDesc.en: Æther energy buildups upon this land are dissipating, but they will eventually return.

desc.cn: 探索等级达到7级时，通关5个不同的重度能量淤积点
desc.en: Reach Exploration Level 7 and complete 5 different Severe Energy Alluvium sites

completeDesc.cn: 我们或许可以相信，在某一天，您甚至能够拥有仅以眼神抹消敌人的能力。
completeDesc.en: We have cause to believe that one day will come when you can eliminate enemies with your gaze.

desc.cn: 单次伤害同时击败至少5个敌人
desc.en: Defeat at least 5 enemies with a single damaging hit

completeDesc.cn: 您的作战设备初显威力。
completeDesc.en: Your combat facilities have demonstrated their capabilities.

desc.cn: 使用作战设备累计击败10个敌人
desc.en: Defeat 10 enemies with combat facilities

completeDesc.cn: 您的作战设备正在沉稳对敌。
completeDesc.en: Your combat facilities are steadily beating back the enemy.

desc.cn: 使用作战设备累计击败100个敌人
desc.en: Defeat 100 enemies with combat facilities

completeDesc.cn: 拥有这样高效的杀戮机器，您似乎已不必亲至险地。
completeDesc.en: With such efficient engines of war, there is almost no need for you to expose yourself to danger.

desc.cn: 使用作战设备累计击败500个敌人
desc.en: Defeat 500 enemies with combat facilities

completeDesc.cn: 多方位全面压制，您的战斗技巧令人叹服。
completeDesc.en: Your combat techniques are breathtaking. You can unleash total and complete domination of the enemy.

desc.cn: 于战斗中让同一个敌人连续20秒无法行动
desc.en: Immobilize the same enemy continuously for 20s during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您体验了人类与天使间生死之争的缩影，您再一次于丰碑上刻下了自己的名字。
completeDesc.en: You experienced a moment that conveyed humanity's desperate struggle for survival in the Aggeloi War. Once again you etched your name upon the great monument.

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关普通模式“无机造物”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Inorganic Construct" stages at Normal mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关普通模式“无机造物”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Inorganic Construct" stages at Normal mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关普通模式“无机造物”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Inorganic Construct" stages at Normal mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关苦难模式“无机造物”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Inorganic Construct" stages at Agony mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关苦难模式“无机造物”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Inorganic Construct" stages at Agony mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关苦难模式“无机造物”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Inorganic Construct" stages at Agony mode

completeDesc.cn: 您直面了那些残酷撕扯文明血肉之人，您再一次于丰碑上刻下了自己的名字。
completeDesc.en: You faced those who brutally tore at the flesh and blood of Civilization, and once again you etched your name upon the great monument.

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关普通模式“大地的弃子”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Those Forsaken by the Land" stages at Normal mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关普通模式“大地的弃子”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Those Forsaken by the Land" stages at Normal mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关苦难模式“大地的弃子”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Those Forsaken by the Land" stages at Agony mode

desc.cn: 在「影拓丰碑」中，通关苦难模式“大地的弃子”的所有关卡
desc.en: In [Umbral Monument], complete all "Those Forsaken by the Land" stages at Agony mode

completeDesc.cn: 格斗技巧于此展露。
completeDesc.en: You have demonstrated your combat techniques.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施加50次物理异常
desc.en: Apply 50 Physical Statuses during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您的敌人深深畏惧您的斩击与重拳。
completeDesc.en: Your enemies now fear your powerful slashes and fists.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施加300次物理异常
desc.en: Apply 300 Physical Statuses during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您是当之无愧的格斗宗师。
completeDesc.en: You are the undisputed master of combat.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施加500次物理异常
desc.en: Apply 500 Physical Statuses during combat

completeDesc.cn: 源石技艺于此流转。
completeDesc.en: Thus flow the Originium Arts.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施加50次法术异常
desc.en: Apply 50 Arts Reactions during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您的敌人深深畏惧您直接高效地应用能量的方式。
completeDesc.en: Your enemies now fear your proficiency in energy manipulation.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施加300次法术异常
desc.en: Apply 300 Arts Reactions during combat

completeDesc.cn: 您是当之无愧的源石技艺大师。
completeDesc.en: You are the undisputed maestro of the Originium Arts.

desc.cn: 于战斗中累计施加500次法术异常
desc.en: Apply 500 Arts Reactions during combat

completeDesc.cn: 无论四号谷地在怎样变化多端的协议空间中，变成了怎样怪异的样子，它都无法阻拦您的脚步。
completeDesc.en: The ever-changing Protocol Space may have transformed images of Valley IV into strange anomalies, but they will never stop your determined advance.

completeDesc.cn: 您已获得了少量谷地调度券。
completeDesc.en: You have acquired some Valley Stock Bills.

desc.cn: 累计获得20000000张谷地调度券
desc.en: Earn 20,000,000 Valley Stock Bills

completeDesc.cn: 您已获得了许多谷地调度券。
completeDesc.en: You have acquired quite a bit of Valley Stock Bills.

desc.cn: 累计获得40000000张谷地调度券
desc.en: Earn 40,000,000 Valley Stock Bills

completeDesc.cn:
您已获得了大量谷地调度券。
越多的票券出现在您手中，就代表着越多的人获得了急需的物资，您厥功至伟。
completeDesc.en:
You have acquired quite a lot of Valley Stock Bills. 
Earning more stock bills means that you have delivered desperately needed supplies to more people. You have done monumental work.

desc.cn: 累计获得80000000张谷地调度券
desc.en: Earn 80,000,000 Valley Stock Bills

completeDesc.cn: 您已获得了少量武陵调度券。
completeDesc.en: You have acquired some Wuling Stock Bills.

desc.cn: 累计获得2000000张武陵调度券
desc.en: Earn 2,000,000 Wuling Stock Bills

completeDesc.cn:
您已完成了多次货物运送。
即便拥有协议技术，但在运输货物上，您仍坚持亲力亲为，这令您的“客户们”无比感动。
completeDesc.en:
You have successfully completed multiple goods deliveries. 
Despite having Techno-Protocol, you insist on delivering the goods in person. Your "clients" are extremely moved by such dedication.

desc.cn: 累计完成20次货物运送
desc.en: Complete Goods Delivery 20 times

desc.cn: 在不受到伤害的情况下，累计完成20次工业材料包裹的运送
desc.en: Pack and deliver 20 Factory Goods packages without taking any damage

completeDesc.cn:
您已成功出售了多次物资。
仰赖于您的直觉与敏锐观察能力，在您的及时调度下，各地都没有出现物资持续严重匮乏的情况。
completeDesc.en:
You have successfully sold plenty of supplies. 
Thanks to your intuition, keen observations, and timely allocations, you kept every region free of protracted supplies shortage.

desc.cn: 在物资调度累计进行15次物资出售
desc.en: Sell supplies at Stock Redistribution 15 times

desc.cn: 在1次物资出售中，对应货物的卖出价格大于等于持有均价的500%
desc.en: In 1 single cargo selling action, achieve a cargo selling price that is at least 500% higher than the average holding price

completeDesc.cn:
您已进行了多次环境监测。
武陵方面代受保护的动物向您表示感谢。
completeDesc.en:
You have performed multiple rounds of environment monitoring. 
Wuling hereby thanks you on behalf of all the critters you protected.

desc.cn: 累计完成5次环境监测委托
desc.en: Complete environment monitoring 5 times

completeDesc.cn:
您已在资源回收站收取了多次物资。
“感谢您准时到来！”那只羽兽似乎在说这样的话。
completeDesc.en:
You have gathered plenty of materials from Recycling Stations. 
In fact, you could almost hear the fowlbeast hoot: "Thank you for another punctual visit."

desc.cn: 在资源回收站累计回收50次资源
desc.en: Gather resources from Recycling Stations 50 times

completeDesc.cn:
四号谷地的所有据点都已在您的支援计划之中。
授人以钓鳞竿，您的支援方针无比正确。
completeDesc.en:
Every Valley IV outpost is now a part of your support program. 
Give them angling rods and teach them to fin. Your support program is proving to be absolutely on track.

desc.cn: 将四号谷地的所有据点纳入支援计划
desc.en: Add all Valley IV outposts into the Endfield support program

desc.cn: 将四号谷地的所有据点等级提升到最高级
desc.en: Raise all Valley IV outposts to the highest level

completeDesc.cn: 您结识了数位性命相托的伙伴。
completeDesc.en: You have met companions who will defend you with their lives.

desc.cn: 累计将5名干员信赖度提升至100%
desc.en: Raise the trust of 5 operators to 100%

completeDesc.cn:
您结识了多位性命相托的伙伴。
您拥有吸引同行者的能力。
completeDesc.en:
You have met multiple companions who will defend you with their lives. 
It seems you have the ability to attract those who share your vision.

desc.cn: 累计将10名干员信赖度提升至100%
desc.en: Raise the trust of 10 operators to 100%

completeDesc.cn:
您结识了许多性命相托的伙伴。
终有一日，这颗星球都将信任您。
completeDesc.en:
You have met many companions who will defend you with their lives. 
One day will come when the world has complete faith in you.

desc.cn: 累计将20名干员信赖度提升至100%
desc.en: Raise the trust of 20 operators to 100%

completeDesc.cn: 您已赠予了干员们一定数量的礼物。
completeDesc.en: Your operators have received a substantial number of gifts from you.

desc.cn: 累计赠送300个干员偏好的礼物
desc.en: Offer 300 gifts that your operators prefer

completeDesc.cn:
您已赠予了干员们一定数量的礼物。
干员宿舍真的能放下这么多礼物吗？
completeDesc.en:
Your operators have received a substantial number of gifts from you. 
Are you sure all these presents would fit in their dorm rooms?

desc.cn: 累计赠送500个干员偏好的礼物
desc.en: Offer 500 gifts that your operators prefer

completeDesc.cn:
您已赠予了干员们一定数量的礼物。
礼物仅是一个契机，真诚才是干员们亲近您的真正理由。
completeDesc.en:
Your operators have received a substantial number of gifts from you. 
Presents offer merely an opportunity. Trust and sincerity are the true reasons why the operators hold you so closely to their hearts.

desc.cn: 累计赠送1000个干员偏好的礼物
desc.en: Offer 1000 gifts that your operators prefer

completeDesc.cn:
您已将总控中枢性能提高至一定水平。
您是否感受到了帝江号的欢欣愉悦？
completeDesc.en:
You have significantly boosted the performance of the Control Nexus. 
Can you feel the happiness and joy of Dijiang?

desc.cn: 将帝江号总控中枢提升至5级
desc.en: Upgrade the Control Nexus of Dijiang to Level 5

completeDesc.cn: 您已实现了武陵工业计划的第一期内容。
completeDesc.en: You have successfully realized Phase 1 of the Wuling AIC Plan.

desc.cn: 完成武陵工业一期的所有技术研究
desc.en: Research every technology in Wuling AIC I

completeDesc.cn:
您已实现了基础工业计划中的所有研究内容。
在您的努力下，集成工业系统已完全与四号谷地适配。
completeDesc.en:
You have researched every technology in the Basic AIC Plan. 
Your hard work has completely adapted the AIC Factory to the rigors of Valley IV.

desc.cn: 完成基础工业计划的所有技术研究
desc.en: Research every technology in the Basic AIC Plan

completeDesc.cn: 权限的进阶令您小有成就。
completeDesc.en: Ascending the Authority Levels has given you a minor achievement.

desc.cn: 管理员权限等阶达到20级
desc.en: Reach Authority Level 20

completeDesc.cn: 权限的进阶令您渐入佳境。
completeDesc.en: Ascending the Authority Levels is getting you back to your form.

desc.cn: 管理员权限等阶达到40级
desc.en: Reach Authority Level 40

completeDesc.cn: 权限的进阶令您独当一面。
completeDesc.en: Ascending the Authority Levels is giving you the ability to exert full command.

desc.cn: 管理员权限等阶达到60级
desc.en: Reach Authority Level 60

completeDesc.cn: 您与一些干员第一次会面。
completeDesc.en: You have met several operators for the first time.

desc.cn: 累计获得5名干员
desc.en: Acquire 5 operators

completeDesc.cn: 您与一些干员第一次会面。您的作战小队已能够初步形成。
completeDesc.en: You have met several operators for the first time. Your combat operations team is taking form.

desc.cn: 累计获得10名干员
desc.en: Acquire 10 operators

completeDesc.cn: 您与一些干员第一次会面。您的干员规模已能支持您进行较为复杂的战术规划。
completeDesc.en: You have met several operators for the first time. You now have enough operators to support more complicated tactical plans.

desc.cn: 累计获得20名干员
desc.en: Acquire 20 operators

completeDesc.cn: 您的一位干员已解放了自身潜能。
completeDesc.en: Full potential has been unlocked for one of your operators.

desc.cn: 累计为1名干员解锁全部潜能
desc.en: Raise 1 operator to full potential

completeDesc.cn:
您的部分干员已解放了自身潜能。
正视自我是提高实力的第一步。
completeDesc.en:
Full potential has been unlocked for some of your operators. 
Proper self-reflection is the first step towards growth.

desc.cn: 累计为10名干员解锁全部潜能
desc.en: Raise 10 operators to full potential

completeDesc.cn:
您的部分干员已解放了自身潜能。
他们超越了瓶颈，但他们相信这仅仅是一个开始。
completeDesc.en:
Full potential has been unlocked for some of your operators. 
Despite overcoming their bottlenecks, these operators believe this is just the beginning.

desc.cn: 累计为15名干员解锁全部潜能
desc.en: Raise 15 operators to full potential

completeDesc.cn: 您的部分干员已将作战技能磨练的炉火纯青。
completeDesc.en: Some of your operators have honed their battle skills to incredible levels.

desc.cn: 累计提升5个干员技能至专精等级3级
desc.en: Upgrade 5 operator skills to Mastery 3

completeDesc.cn: 您的部分干员已将作战技能磨练的炉火纯青。您与干员之间的信任促成了这一现状。
completeDesc.en: Some of your operators have honed their battle skills to incredible levels. The trust you have built with your operators helped to make this happen.

desc.cn: 累计提升10个干员技能至专精等级3级
desc.en: Upgrade 10 operator skills to Mastery 3

completeDesc.cn: 您的部分干员已将作战技能磨练的炉火纯青。不同领域，不同专精，但您正带领着干员们向共同的未来前进。
completeDesc.en: Some of your operators have honed their battle skills to incredible levels. Despite the great diversity in their fields of expertise and skill sets, different operators work together as you lead them towards a shared vision of the future.

desc.cn: 累计提升20个干员技能至专精等级3级
desc.en: Upgrade 20 operator skills to Mastery 3

completeDesc.cn: 它承载着您的伤痕、您的荣耀、您的生命，从始至终。
completeDesc.en: It carried your scars, your glories, and your life from the beginning, and will keep doing so till the very end.

desc.cn: 将1件装备的所有属性升级到满精锻状态
desc.en: Upgrade all stats of 1 piece of gear to Fully Artificed

completeDesc.cn: 证明您抵达更高探索等级的奖章。
completeDesc.en: A medal proving that you have achieved a higher Exploration Level.

desc.cn: 探索等级达到2级
desc.en: Reach Exploration Level 2

completeDesc.cn:
证明您抵达更高探索等级的奖章。
更艰难的环境，更多的机会
completeDesc.en:
A medal proving that you have achieved a higher Exploration Level. 
Tougher environments offer greater opportunities.

desc.cn: 探索等级达到4级
desc.en: Reach Exploration Level 4

completeDesc.cn:
证明您抵达更高探索等级的奖章。
您已抵达最高峰。
completeDesc.en:
A medal proving that you have achieved a higher Exploration Level. 
You have reached the zenith.

desc.cn: 探索等级达到7级
desc.en: Reach Exploration Level 7

completeDesc.cn: 您的武器库略显充实。
completeDesc.en: Your weapon arsenal seems well stocked.

desc.cn: 累计获得10件不同的武器
desc.en: Acquire 10 different weapons

completeDesc.cn:
您的武器库略显充实。
无论是梅什科工业还是熔炉要塞，各公司的精品就在其中。
completeDesc.en:
Your weapon arsenal seems well stocked. 
It now includes some of the finest pieces manufactured by Mieszko Industries or even Fort Forgefane.

desc.cn: 累计获得20件不同的武器
desc.en: Acquire 20 different weapons

completeDesc.cn:
您的武器库略显充实。
如此全面的收集，您是否在替武库工程师进行同类产品调研？
completeDesc.en:
Your weapon arsenal seems well stocked. 
Why acquire such an extensive collection? Are you helping our Arsenal Engineer compare weapons from various manufacturers?

desc.cn: 累计获得40件不同的武器
desc.en: Acquire 40 different weapons

completeDesc.cn: 在无数次精致保养后，您的武器已与各种伟大传说中的珍宝并无差别。
completeDesc.en: After countless rounds of meticulous upgrades and rework, your weapon is now considered the equal of treasured relics wielded by great legends.

desc.cn: 将1件武器的技能RANK等级之和升级到18
desc.en: Upgrade 1 weapon to a total skill rank of 18

desc.cn: 将1件武器的技能RANK等级之和升级到25
desc.en: Upgrade 1 weapon to a total skill rank of 25

completeDesc.cn: 这并非刻意为之的陷阱，联盟工团正在调查抓捕相关责任人，请您放心。
completeDesc.en: Be rest assured. These pitfalls are not deliberate traps. The UWST is also conducting an investigation with the aim of apprehending those responsible.

desc.cn: 踩碎矿脉源区所有的脆弱地面
desc.en: Break all weak surfaces of the Origin Lodespring

completeDesc.cn: 帝江号正计划为您研发贴地飞行设备。
completeDesc.en: Dijiang has made plans to research and develop a device capable of low altitude flight for you.

desc.cn: 使用滑索架、弹射器和绳索累计移动10000米
desc.en: Travel 10000 meters using ziplines, bounce pads, and ropes

completeDesc.cn: 显然，本次出现在空中的并非轨道漂浮物，而是您和您的干员。
completeDesc.en: Are those fowls? Are they pieces of orbital debris? No! They're you and your operators.

desc.cn: 从20米及以上高空下落并命中敌人
desc.en: Fall from a height of at least 20 meters and hit an enemy

completeDesc.cn: 但这仍然无法令斧甲兽回头，真是可惜。
completeDesc.en: But the Axe Armorbeast still refused to turn around. Shame.

desc.cn: 使用防御反击技能终止斧甲兽的连续冲撞
desc.en: Use the defensive parry to intercept the Axe Armorbeast's ramming assault

completeDesc.cn: 您协助四位源石虫完成了搬家工作。
completeDesc.en: You helped four Originium Slugs move house.

desc.cn: 踢落4个源石虫
desc.en: Kick 4 Originium Slugs till they fall

completeDesc.cn:
几件小事，几个包裹。
您与她相会于黄昏下的天空，空白信件之上终将写满美好记忆的馈赠。
completeDesc.en:
A few tiny errands, a few packages to deliver. 
You met her under the sunset skies. Beautiful memories and moments shall be the gifts that fill her empty letter.

desc.cn: 完成支线任务「信使的信」
desc.en: Complete the side mission [Letter From a Messenger]

completeDesc.cn: 您已重归塔卫二。
completeDesc.en: You have returned to Talos-II.

desc.cn: 完成主线任务「序章 - 进程·复苏」
desc.en: Complete the main mission [Prologue - Process: Awakening]

completeDesc.cn: 开拓的未来已降下至四号谷地。
completeDesc.en: The future of frontier development has descended upon Valley IV.

desc.cn: 降下一座科技的结晶
desc.en: Summon the fruit of a great technological endeavor

completeDesc.cn:
您击败了“碾骨之拳”。
拥抱超域？迎来新生？您如何看待聂菲斯的宣言？
completeDesc.en:
You have defeated the "Bonekrushing Fist". 
Embrace the Æther and usher in a new future? What is your opinion about Nefarith's speech?

desc.cn: 完成主线任务「第一章 - 进程Ⅰ - 要塞决战」
desc.en: Complete the main mission [Chapter Ⅰ Process Ⅰ: Fort Showdown]

completeDesc.cn:
您目击了一场突如其来的“爆炸”。
显然，发电站并非易守难攻。
completeDesc.en:
You witnessed an unexpected "explosion". 
The Power Plant is apparently not as defensible as it seems.

desc.cn: 见证一场袭击的发生
desc.en: Witness an attack in progress

completeDesc.cn: 您击碎了局部“复生”的巨大天使。
completeDesc.en: You have defeated a partially revived Aggelos of massive proportions.

desc.cn: 完成主线任务「第一章 - 进程Ⅲ - 世代摇篮」
desc.en: Complete the main mission [Chapter Ⅰ Process Ⅲ: Cradle of the Ages]

completeDesc.cn: 即将吞噬四号谷地的裂隙已在您与同伴们的努力下关闭。
completeDesc.en: You and your team fought hard and sealed the rift that was about to devour the entirety of Valley IV.

desc.cn: 完成主线任务「未熄火种」
desc.en: Complete the main mission [Undying Cinders]

completeDesc.cn: 不祥的征兆显现于塔卫二各处，您的旅途尚未结束。
completeDesc.en: Foreboding signs have appeared throughout Talos-II. Your journey is not yet complete.

desc.cn: 完成主线任务「间章 - 四方会议」
desc.en: Complete the main mission [Intermission: Conference of the Four]

completeDesc.cn: 您已抵达了武陵城。
completeDesc.en: You have reached Wuling City.

desc.cn: 到达一座全新的城市
desc.en: Reach an all-new city

completeDesc.cn:
记忆之痕于大火中变幻。
即便名为过去的碎片层峦叠嶂，但您依旧与莱万汀携手走出了无尽回廊。
completeDesc.en:
The scars of memories may change in the fire. 
Though fragments of the past have built up like imposing mountains, you took Laevatain's hand and left the unending corridor.

desc.cn: 完成支线任务「燃尽记忆之灰」
desc.en: Complete the side mission [Let Fire Consume the Ashen Past]

completeDesc.cn:
狼卫查明了真相，处决了背叛者。
那柄短刀插在坟前……狼群不同以往，他已清楚自己应该做些什么。
completeDesc.en:
Wulfgard found the truth and executed the traitor. 
He plunged that dagger in the earth before the grave... The Pack had changed. He knew what he had to do.

desc.cn: 完成支线任务「离群之狼」
desc.en: Complete the side mission: [Lone Wolf]

completeDesc.cn:
一箱迟到的颜料。
沿着塔塔的行迹，绘下一幅幅涂鸦，伊冯在色彩中看到了重逢。
completeDesc.en:
A crate of pigments had arrived late. 
You followed Tata's trail and created various graffiti. In these colors, Yvonne saw the potential of reunion.

desc.cn: 完成支线任务「爱，呐喊和原型机」
desc.en: Complete the side mission: [Love, Scream & The Prototype]

completeDesc.cn: 您帮助许许多多人解决了问题。
completeDesc.en: You helped plenty of people with their problems.

desc.cn: 完成共计30项探索任务
desc.en: Complete 30 exploration missions

completeDesc.cn:
您帮助许许多多人解决了问题。
并非作战任务，亦不谋求回报。
completeDesc.en:
You helped plenty of people with their problems. 
Not all of them involved combat, and your goal transcends monetary pay.

desc.cn: 完成共计40项探索任务
desc.en: Complete 40 exploration missions

completeDesc.cn:
您帮助许许多多人解决了问题。
受助者在今后的生活中也将帮助他人，在塔卫二，人类必须相互搀扶。
completeDesc.en:
You helped plenty of people with their problems. 
Those who benefited from your assistance will help others in return. The people of Talos-II must learn to support one another.

desc.cn: 完成共计50项探索任务
desc.en: Complete 50 exploration missions

completeDesc.cn: 您的设备已受到了一定次数的维护。
completeDesc.en: Your facility has received some repairs.

desc.cn: 共享设备累计受维护50次
desc.en: Shared facility receives 50 repairs

completeDesc.cn: 您的设备已受到了多次维护。
completeDesc.en: Your facility has received plenty of repairs.

desc.cn: 共享设备累计受维护200次
desc.en: Shared facility receives 200 repairs

completeDesc.cn:
您的设备已受到了大量维护。
显然，您帮助到了许多人，受助者无不对您的设备依依难舍，他们对您的设备竭力挽留。
completeDesc.en:
Your facility has received a massive amount of repairs. 
Evidently, you have helped many and the beneficiaries became rather attached to your facilities. They have done all that they could to keep the factory machines around.

desc.cn: 共享设备累计受维护500次
desc.en: Shared facility receives 500 repairs

completeDesc.cn: 您设置于帝江号的生产设施高效运转中，这离不开好友的慷慨助力。
completeDesc.en: Production facilities you furnished aboard Dijiang are working efficiently, thanks to the generous help from your friends.

desc.cn: 累计获得好友提供的生产助力100次
desc.en: Receive 100 production assists from your friends

completeDesc.cn:
您慷慨地向好友提供了生产助力。
塔卫二因您这样的助人精神而欣欣向荣。
completeDesc.en:
You generally offered production assist to your friends. 
Your altruism is the reason why Talos-II can prosper.

desc.cn: 累计为好友提供生产助力50次
desc.en: Give 50 production assists to your friends

completeDesc.cn:
您已进行了一定次数的情报交流。
世界随您的目光，因您的情报而扩大。
completeDesc.en:
You performed a certain number of clue exchanges. 
The world grows with your vision and the intel you have collected.

desc.cn: 累计参与50次情报交流
desc.en: Participate in a total of 50 clue exchanges.
